product_name: REI Bootie Socks - 2 Pairs - Infant Girls'
long_description: The REI Bootie socks will help keep baby girls' toes toasty warm, and nonskid bottoms give little feet traction from the very first step. Socks are made from a soft blend of baby CoolMax(R) polyester, acrylic, rayon and nylon with a touch of spandex for stretch and shape retention. Lightly cushioned heels and toes add comfort and protection from wear. Soft, roll-down cuffs are comfortable against tender skin. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9. Please note: a package of 2 pairs counts as 1 pair of socks for the 10% volume discount.
short_description: The REI Bootie socks will help keep baby girls' toes toasty warm, and nonskid bottoms give little feet traction from the very first step.
